version_description: This update contains performance improvements and bug fixes.
This update contains performance improvements and bug fixes.
This update contains performance improvements and bug fixes.
This update contains performance improvements and bug fixes.

This app update improves the features and functionality you rely on to stay connected while on the go.

Improvements & Fixes:
- The Nextiva App now registers correctly when moving between WiFi and mobile networks
- Local call handling has been fixed
- Presence can now be controlled in the background
- Multiple vibrations in silent mode so you don’t miss a call
- Easily swipe between Chat and Audio/Video communication views
- Add more participants to video calls or N-way video (without having to downgrade to an audio call)
- Support for iPhone 6S/6S Plus
- Additional enhancements to improve your communications experience

Brand New
. Update to overall look and feel
. Simplified navigation
. Contacts are now called “Favorites”
. Pull a call from desk phone or desktop app to the mobile app with one button
. Transfer a call from the mobile app to your mobile phone network with one button

Improvements & Fixes
. Improved performance for video calls
. General performance enhancements and bug fixes to improve the overall communications experience
